completing the 'Build a Pyramid' behavior successfully

reward.description.MemoryMatch.WinGame.V.translation: Won a game of Memory Match in Vs. mode

reward.description.MemoryMatch.Lives.One.translation: Won Memory Match Vs. mode on your last life

reward.description.MemoryMatch.Lives.Two.translation: Won Memory Match Vs. mode with two lives left

reward.description.MemoryMatch.Lives.Thr.translation: Won Memory Match Vs. mode without losing a life

reward.description.MemoryMatch.PatternLe.translation: Completed a Memory Match pattern > 5 lights long.

Completed a Memory Match pattern > 20 lights long.

reward.description.MemoryMatch.HighScore.translation: Set a new pattern record for Memory Match solo

reward.description.QuickTap.WinGame.Thre.translation: Won a game of Quick Tap in 'Three Colors' mode

reward.description.QuickTap.Accuracy.50.translation: Finished a game of Quick Tap with tap accuracy >50%

reward.description.QuickTap.Accuracy.100.translation: Finished a game of Quick Tap with 100% tap accuracy!

reward.description.Keepaway.Shutout.translation: Won a game of Keepaway 5 to 0
